tracks.text: The moon shines between white cherry blossom trees. Petals drift in the wind.
A street light flickers near a high school.
A bleeding face roars
Blood drips from a schoolgirl with vacant eyes
A zombie throws back its head. It kneels over a body on top of a flat roof under a blue sky.
A boy with black hair runs across the roof, carrying a bloody bat.
A girl runs alongside him, carrying a pointed stick. The boy bats a zombie.
The pair and an injured boy run across the roof.
The black haired boy bats a zombie in the head. A zombie girl shuffles, and the boy flips her. They run up stairs.
The girl stops and turns. She stabs a zombie behind her. Her 29E bust bounces.
The zombie grabs the stick. He wrests it free, then swings, pushing her against the wall. She gasps and falls, revealing white panties peaking around her 35 inch bubble butt.
The zombie shuffles toward her. She gasps.
The injured boy, Hisashi, grabs the bat and runs back down the stairs. He swings for the zombie's head.
The girl, Rei, stands and beams up at him.
A zombie girl shuffles after them.
Hisashi runs down the stairs and kicks it. The zombie falls back and breaks its neck.
Hisashi wraps an arm over Rei's shoulder. The black haired boy glances at the pair climbing up the stairs. He looks back down at the zombies.
Zombies chew on corpses. Zombies shuffle across a bloody roof top.
A bloodshot zombie moans.
Text, based on the comic by Daisuke Sato and Shouji Sato. Planning, Akihiro Kawamura, Hisato Usui, Yasuhiro Mikami.
Text, High School of the DEAD
Lyrics, Without the waving sense of reality
Where is this sentiment that's piled up
Just like rubble going?
Holding onto the crushed dream
I ran like crazy, brushing off the red rain
What will I see at the end of crumbled emotions?
And what's there?
I don't know yet
The future of all fragile things continued
To spread out silently in front of my eyes
Text on a sign, Act 1, Spring Time of the DEAD

The black haired boy leans against the railing of the exterior stairway. He looks out past the school's tall fences, down the hill to the city below. He remembers talking to Rei, when they were in elementary school.
High school
Class 2-A
Rei and Hisashi stand together on the street. She notices us from opposite a train crossing and averts her eyes.
Takashi turns
Takagi has hip-length pink hair tied up in twin tails
She walks off
In a memory, Rei walks down the hall. He stares from an empty classroom.
He stares at a half-empty parking lot.
He glances at the school's front gate.
A man in a suit hits his arms against the gate. A red headed woman with ample cleavage approaches. 3 men stand behind her.
A muscular man approaches and grabs the stranger's collar through the gate and jerks.
The stranger bites Tejima's forearm. He geysers blood and falls back. Tejima rolls around. Hayashi steps closer.
Takashi watches, eyes wide.
Tejima rolls his head back. The other staff stare down.
Tejima twitches
His bloodshot eyes open
Tejima pulls on her bra, climbs to her neck, and bites.
Takashi steps back
Tejima bites. Hayashi's legs go limp. One teacher falls back, another flees. Takashi grits his teeth then runs up the stairs.
He rounds the corner and runs down a hall.
He opens the door to a classroom. The students turn. He walks up to Rei
He grabs Rei
Takagi stands
A heavy boy stares
Takashi slaps her
He turns to Hisashi. His face hardens
Rei runs down the hall
Hisashi opens a locker
broom handle
He hands her a phone.
Her eyes widen
Students look up.
A teacher in glasses frowns. The heavy boy crawls through a door.
Girls in tight gym outfits stare up
A girl in a dojo stands, holding a bokken practice sword.
A blond nurse sleeps on her own breasts like pillows. She wakes and looks up.
Blood splatter drips near the A/V room microphone
Students stare, frozen.
Chalk rolls towards the edge of a podium.
And falls
Students push each other
The scramble through the hallways.
Girls trip down the stairs. Others run over them.
A boy punches another boy. A third boy pulls a girls hair. A hand reaches out.
A girl falls down the stairs, revealing pink and white striped panties. A boy lies limp on the ground, bleeding.
Hisashi turns from the crowd.
Rei runs. Takashi follows.
A teacher limps across a catwalk.
Hisashi eyes blood running down the teacher's pants. Wakisaka's face is gray, with dark eyelids surrounding empty eyes. He opens his mouth wide and moans. Blood drips from his mouth.
High School of the DEAD
The zombie sways and stumbles forward, arms out, reaching for Rei's chest.
The zombie grabs the broomstick
Under her miniskirt, Rei wears white panties with frills and ribbons
She furrows her brow.
She pushes back, runs, swings, runs, leaps, and overhead strikes.
She stabs him through the chest. He dangles from the handle.
The zombie lurches
The zombie shuffles. The stick in its chest swings her to the side. Her breasts bounce.
She grabs the stick and holds it
Hisashi jump on its back.
The zombie turns its head
180 degrees
The zombie bites Hisashi's bicep.
Takashi swings a bat
Rei stabs the zombie in the back. Hisashi struggles.
The zombie's eyes bulge and bites through Hisashi's coat. Blood splatters.
Takashi takes the bat, runs, and swings. Blood splatters across the walkway.
The zombie drops to his knees and falls.
They look over the railing. A boy holds a girl down as she struggles and screams. He bites her neck. Rei gasps.
They run across the flat top roof, up to a railing.
Smoke and sparks billow. Cars are gridlocked. Blood splatters streets. Figures shamble.
Streams of spoke rise from all over the city.
Wind blows and pushes Rei over. Hisashi grabs and holds her. They look up to see 4 military painted helicopters flying overhead. Soldiers stand in doorways.
He points at zombies on the ground
Zombies in gym outfits hold a girl who screams
Girls run past lilies
A zombie grabs Toshimi's ankle and drags her down the stairs. She holds Misuzu's hand.
Misuzu stomps Toshimi's face. She rolls down the stairs.
Zombies feast on her. Toshimi steps back from the landing. Zombies surround her and grab her face and clothes.
A zombie bursts through a classroom window.
A teacher stumbles in a daze. A student runs past. Blood splatters the floor.
The teacher leaps from the 3rd floor window. He lands head first on bricks below.
A zombie tackles a student. A zombie shuffles upstairs. A girl stands on the landing, holding a bokken.
Hisashi eyes stairs to a platform.
Takashi readies his bat.
They run across the roof. Takashi bats a zombie in the head. A zombie girl shuffles, and he flips it. Later, a zombie swings the broom handle, pushing Rei against the wall.
Hisashi bats the zombie.
Scattered clouds float overhead, yellowed by the afternoon sun. Sakura cherry blossom petals drift over bicycles. Zombies shuffle.
Zombies push against tables, barricading the entry to the platform. Hisashi coughs blood.
Takashi stares from across the platform.
Hisashi raises his head. Blood drips from his mouth. Black eye lids ring distant eyes.
Hisashi pants. Rei's eyes grow wide.
Takashi stands across the platform, holding the bat, staring.
Hisashi points
He vomits blood
Takashi stares. Hisashi rolls around.
Takashi grits his teeth.
Clouds drift over the seaside city as pillars of smoke rise
Takashi frowns, his hair drifting in the wind.
Clouds part, bathing him in light
The light touches Hisashi's body and Rei, bent over him.
Hisashi twitches.
Takashi stares.
He grips his bat.
Hisashi jerks
Takashi pulls Rei away.
Takashi steps
Hisashi stumbles forward, gray and moaning
Takashi runs forward, bat in hand
Lyrics, In the midst of the endless world
The last blooming word
Sneer at the despair
I won't look back any more
Shout yourself hoarse
Ordinary everyday life bursts open
The day you and the sun died
into the whirlpool of the unwanted noise.
Sucked into it without knowing it
Don't forget my voice
Until the day we meet again
He looks at Rei
She glares. He narrows his eyes
He walks away
4 chairs block a pile of tables. He untapes and moves a chair.
He climbs on a table
She grabs him.
Tears pour down her face
She stands in the space cleared by the chair. She holds his forearm against her chest. She steps back and Takashi joins her on the ground. He hugs her.
The barricade shakes behind him
She hugs him back
He frowns. Wind blows their hair.
He holds her tightly
Zombies shuffle across the ground around the building
Text, to be continued
Preview
Text, Act 2 Escape from the DEAD

Post-episode footnote: Sakura, aka cherry blossoms, bloom for a week in spring time. In Tokyo, this is typically the first week of April. Japanese school years start the first week of April, so falling sakura petals are strongly associated with the first few days of school.
